name: Hyper Nexus Quest Deluxe [DEMO]
description:
Hyper Nexus Quest Deluxe is a crossover RPG about saving the world from a cosmic threat.

  • Battle various monstrosities!
  • Play as characters from indie (and not indie) media!
  • Experience an intentionally stupid story!
  • Read loads of mildly funny dialogue!
  • Avoid crabs!
  • Fight in a simple but challenging combat system!
  • Engage in combat with up to 10 party members at the same time!
  • Venture through challenging optional bosses and attack brutal optional bosses!
  • Engage in a philosophical discussion with a dumpster!
  • And much more!

The game currently lasts about 2-4 hours to get through depending on skill level. The game's main story is about 6/8ths of the way done and the optional stuff is like 5% done. The full game will be out when I feel like releasing it. Enjoy!

Media included in the crossover:

  • Anodyne
  • Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass
  • Space Funeral
  • Off
  • Deltarune
  • Mother 3
  • Regular Show
  • Aqua Teen Hunger Force
